emergencyText: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available...
doctorsText: Check the availability of doctors and get proper consultation.
slider1Text: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
slider1ExtraText: Our hospital ensures state-of-the-art facilities and round-the-clock medical attention. From preventive care to specialized treatments, your health and safety are our top priorities.
slider2Text: Providing the best medical support and treatments with expert care.
slider2ExtraText: We combine modern technology with compassionate care, offering personalized treatment plans for every patient. Our experienced staff guides you through every step of your health journey.
slider3Text: Dedicated doctors and staff to make sure you live healthier and happier.
slider3ExtraText: From routine check-ups to emergency interventions, our dedicated team works tirelessly to ensure your well-being. We focus on holistic care, patient education, and creating a safe healing environment.
missionText: Our platform is dedicated to making healthcare information simple, accessible, and interactive...

specs.vaccinationDetail: Stay updated with vaccination schedules and reminders. Our platform helps you keep track of upcoming vaccinations, provides alerts, and ensures you never miss an important dose.
specs.diseaseDetail: Get awareness tips and precautionary measures for diseases. We provide detailed insights, prevention guides, and awareness campaigns to protect your health.
specs.nutritionDetail: Daily nutrition and diet tips for a healthy lifestyle. Explore balanced diet plans, food suggestions, and easy tips for maintaining overall wellness.
specs.mentalDetail: Access resources and programs for mental well-being. Find meditation guides, stress management resources, and mental fitness exercises.
specs.fitnessDetail: Personalized fitness routines and workout guidance. From beginner to advanced, our platform helps you maintain fitness with easy-to-follow programs.
specs.emergencyDetail: Quick access to emergency medical contacts and support. Get instant help with our emergency hotline directory and nearby hospital finder.

footer.tagline2: We care for you and your family.

about_desc: At HaiDoc, we are dedicated to improving lives through healthcare, awareness, and innovation.
who_we_are_desc: HaiDoc is your trusted healthcare partner. From prevention to treatment, our mission is to deliver reliable medical services, spread awareness, and support families in every step of their healthcare journey.
vaccination_desc: We organize vaccination drives and awareness programs to safeguard communities against preventable diseases.
disease_awareness_desc: Educating people about health risks and guiding them to live healthier, safer lives.
faculty_desc: Experienced doctors, nurses, and medical staff committed to providing world-class healthcare services.
awards_desc: Recognized for excellence in healthcare innovation and community service worldwide.
